alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lincoln; Moore (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 14 at 2:33PM CST until January 16 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow possible. Total accumulations up to 3 inches, with higher amounts possible on the plateau. * WHERE...Southern Middle Tennessee. * WHEN...From late Saturday night through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible, and due to the presence of cold temperatures, hazardous travel conditions could persist into Monday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Locally heavier snowfall amounts may occur in snow bands that develop across the region. So, keep abreast of the latest forecast information as expected snowfall totals are likely to change.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is a potential for significant snow, sleet, or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
